channel.title: Phonescape server, i need help
channel.description:
Ok, commands DO NOT WORK! Im using a compiler and it saves command into a file called command.txt (what do i do next with it!) I need someone who uses phonescape to help me know how to use commands, cos atm commands dont work on phonescape for me.
P.s Excuse my other thread =p

item.title: Phonescape server, i need help

item.description:
@r4p3dscape wrote:

WHAT.??
HOW DO U USE THE COMPILER IN THE RUNSERVER.BAT FILE?

Read full topic

item.title: Phonescape server, i need help
item.dc:creator: @Killed_By_Squirrel Killed By Squirrel
item.description:
@Killed_By_Squirrel wrote:

Search for "master" or "sweet" and add it with them.

-Copy and Paste this into your compile.bat:- @echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac" *.java pause and use Mod T’s ‘perfect compiler’ in your runserver.bat file.

Read full topic

item.title: Phonescape server, i need help
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

For teleporting:

	}
	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMAND"))
	{
		teleportToX = XCORDS;
		teleportToY = YCORDS;
	}

For Stuff

 if (command.startsWith("COMMAND"))
			{
				addItem(OBJECTID, AMOUNT);
                                addItem(OBJECTID, AMOUNT);
                                addItem(OBJECTID, AMOUNT);
                                addItem(OBJECTID, AMOUNT);
			}

Have to add with the OTHER commands
